ingredients.content: 3 oz radishes, stems removed, in pieces (½ in.)
3 oz lacinato kale, ribs removed, in pieces (½ in.)
½ tsp chili powder, to taste
14 oz jackfruit, canned in brine, rinsed, drained
3 oz red onions, thinly sliced, to serve

preparations.content: Place radishes, carrots, kale and onion into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl.
Place a bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in olive oil and set aside.

Place almond milk, vinegar, honey, mustard, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 4<b> while pouring reserved olive oil onto mixing bowl lid, letting it drizzle around measuring cup in a thin stream onto rotating blades to create an emulsion. Toss dressing with reserved vegetables and set aside.
Place 3 oz onion, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>3 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add bbq sauce, water, brown sugar, paprika, chili powder, salt and pepper and cook <b>2 min/212°F/speed <b>.
Add jackfruit and cook <b>2 min/212°F//speed 2<b>. Serve hot on hamburger buns, topped with Coleslaw and thinly sliced red onions.
